Title: relates to the growth of industrial hemp and the regulation of hemp extract; repealer
Summary: Relates to the growth of industrial hemp and the regulation of hemp extract and provides for the licensing of cannabinoid related hemp extract and the requirements for such licenses.
LawCode: Rpld §§507, 508, 509, 510, 511, 512, 513 & 514, amd Ag & Mkts L, generally; amd §3302, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law and the public health law, in relation to the growth of industrial hemp and the regulation of hemp extract; and to repeal certain provisions of the agriculture and markets law relating thereto
